alert.note: Alert for Holmes (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 11 at 2:56PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Alabama and Panhandle Florida, including the following counties, in southeast Alabama, Geneva. In Panhandle Florida, Holmes and Washington. * WHEN...Until 400 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 156 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Vernon, Geneva, Bonifay, Hartford, Slocomb, Caryville, Esto, Westville, Noma, Black, Bethlehem, Miller Crossroads, Smith Crossroads, Izagora, Ards Crossroads, Thurston, Gritney, New Hope, Holland Crossroads and Eunola. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
